description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills, built with React for a dynamic and responsive user experience.
problemsSolved: -Using Ref to scroll to sections smoothly.
-Using Props to pass data between components effectively.
-Using State to manage component states efficiently.
-Separate the data and UI by using a JSON file to render a dynamic project list via the `.map()` function.
Design a responsive layout that works well on both desktop and mobile devices.
-Using component structure to organize the project for better maintainability.
-Using Vercel for easy deployment and hosting.

description: A weather forecast website that provides accurate and up-to-date weather information for various locations.
problemsSolved: Using the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch real-time weather data.
Using JSON for Using JSON to store location data allows for more accurate and up-to-date location information in Vietnam, instead of the CountryNow API.
